verses.text: Praise ye the \sc Lord\sc*. (א) I will praise the \sc Lord\sc* with \add my\add* whole heart, (ב) In the assembly of the upright, and \add in\add* the congregation.
(ג) The works of the \sc Lord\sc* \add are\add* great, (ד) Sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
(ה) His work \add is\add* honourable and glorious: (ו) And his righteousness endureth for ever.
(ז) He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: (ח) The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* gracious and full of compassion.
(ט) He hath given meat unto them that fear him: (י) He will ever be mindful of his covenant.
(כ) He hath shewed his people the power of his works, (ל) That \add he\add* may give them the heritage of the heathen.
(מ) The works of his hands \add are\add* verity and judgment; (נ) All his commandments \add are\add* sure.
(ס) They stand fast for ever and ever, (ע) \add And are\add* done in truth and uprightness.
(פ) He sent redemption unto his people: (צ) He hath commanded his covenant for ever: (ק) Holy and reverend \add is\add* his name.
(ר) The fear of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* the beginning of wisdom: (ש) A good understanding have all they that do \add his commandments:\add* (ת) His praise endureth for ever.
